tr.td: Handles calls for checking transfer eligibility.
Calls internal service to determine if transfer is eligible.

Handles checking and validating transfers against any rules
enforced by the scheme.

li.span: DSFPs will pass in all transfer information
DSFPs will also maintain their own transfer rules
Will provide a success indicator and message
Focus on a boolean success/failure, with the ability to expand to warnings
Current scope focused on a transfer amount limit (
